effect.shortEffect: This Pokémon automatically switches out when its HP drops below half.
effect.full: After this Pokémon is hit by a move, if that move caused this Pokémon's HP to drop below half, it switches out.

description.sun-moon: The Pokémon, sensing danger, switches out when its HP becomes half or less.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The Pokémon, sensing danger, switches out when its HP becomes half or less.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The Pokémon, sensing danger, switches out when its HP becomes half or less.
description.sword-shield: The Pokémon, sensing danger, switches out when its HP becomes half or less.
